sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_240028_hikon_tasks"> <x_240028_hikon_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <acceptance_criteria>when a reply on an incident comes to the system and the incident is closed, a new incident will be created.</acceptance_criteria> <active>true</active> <actual_hours>1970-01-01 00:40:00</actual_hours> <approval>approved</approval> <assigned_to display_value="Rachel Rowlandson">45ccd59e4f2863007e72aa95d310c767</assigned_to> <assignment_group display_value="GB3" name="GB3">242324124fa463007e72aa95d310c748</assignment_group> <category display_value="Inbound action">5ba54b474f6ce3007e72aa95d310c7a1</category> <company display_value="GB3">b771e09e4f6463007e72aa95d310c784</company> <description>When an e-mail comes to the system as a reply on a closed incident, the system will create a new Incident (based on the inbound rule)</description> <estimated_hours>1970-01-01 00:45:00</estimated_hours> <estimated_hours_sp/> <notes/> <number>TAS0001122</number> <package display_value="PACK0001015">ad90a6b24f60e3007e72aa95d310c7c7</package> <short_description>Inbound action - reply on closed incident</short_description> <solution_description/> <state>testing</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-09-21 11:25:18</sys_created_on> <sys_id>04efb0f34f6c23007e72aa95d310c7da</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-01 12:35:20</sys_updated_on> <task_watch_list/> <update_set_name/> </x_240028_hikon_tasks> </record_update>
